chapter.metadata: i’m sorry you got caught in this. i don’t know if you can even hear me right now
chapter.text: With no where else to go, you decide to follow it. ^1500It leads you through the darkness, passing by and dodging floating objects along the way. ^1500As you continue to follow him, the items grow less dense, eventually seeing none at all. ^1500You wonder how it knows where it’s going, just walking through the darkness with no direction. ^1500With each stride, it appears to jolt more violently.
